issue.summary: TSGA10IP contains a potential genome sequencing error
issue.description: Human chromosome 11 clone AP006287.2 contains a potential genome sequencing error, causing a nonsense substitution in TSGA10IP
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459671.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of Gene ID: 254187 (TSGA10IP) in GRCh38.

issue.description: An insertion of a G in the 5' UTR of the DIXDC1 gene is not supported by any transcripts or other species genomes.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP000907_2 supports the evidence from the transcripts and has been incorporated into the tile path to solve the issue.

issue.description: Reference component AC139749.4 underrepresents copy number of a 69-nucleotide tandem repeat that affects representation of MUC2 (GeneID: 4583).
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC239832.3 was generated and used to provide new representation for the MUC2 tandem repeat in GRCh38, replacing the sequence provided by AC139749.4 in prior assembly versions. Although this update provided more copies of the tandem repeat, the representation of MUC2 remained incomplete. Subsequent to the release of GRCh38, finished component AC256300.1 was added to the assembly, replacing AC239832.3. This update provides approximately 95 copies of the repeat; the genomic representation of MUC2 (GeneID: 4583) is now considered complete.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC203610.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383547.1 created to capture sequence from AC203610.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383547.1 created to capture 5732 bp of sequence from AC203610.2 not represented in reference chromosome.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site - MUC5AC is incomplete in GRCh37
issue.description: MUC5AC is incomplete in GRCh37. The missing sequence falls within the gap between WGS sequences AADD01112371.1 and AADC01095577.1. Current flanking clone accessions are AC139749.4 and AP006588.1
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-263. Please see Jira issue HG-263 for all future updates regarding this issue

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_007180.2 (TREH) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The switch points between AP002954.1 and AP000941.6 have been changed in order to exclude the SNPs rs6589669, rs6589670, rs6589671 and rs1148549. This change is supported by 1000 genomes data.

issue.summary: Updates needed for FIX patch GL877874.1? (OR8U8/OR8U9 and OR9G9)
issue.description: Possible updates needed for FIX patch GL877874.1? (OR8U8/OR8U9 and OR9G9) to capture variation.
issue.resolution_text: The previous FIX patch that inadvertently introduced the insertion allele has now been updated so that this allele is now represenetd as a NOVEL patch on ALT_LOCI_1.

issue.summary: FP326773 may be contaminated with sequence from pig clone FP236641
issue.description: FP326773 may be contaminated with sequence from pig clone FP236641
issue.resolution_text: This ~2000bp piece of sequence was investigated and was found by blasting to be pig sequence contamination. It was removed from the working draft sequence.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Annotation question
issue.description: Possible inconsistencies in the mapping information for TAPBP gene identified.
issue.resolution_text: This region has been investigated and it has been determined that TAPBP is correctly located on chromosome 6.

issue.description: NM_198185.3 aligns with an intron-like gap of AluYa5 sequence corresponding to NC_000011.9:7717231..7716916 (AC104237.2:56096..56413) that does not exist in the HuRef assembly or in mouse.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is dealt with in HG-985. This ticket will be closed and all further work will be recorded in HG-985.

issue.description: When aligning NM_001002905.1 (OR8G1) to the reference assembly, some sequence is not aligned, suggesting a deletion in the assembly at this locus.
issue.resolution_text: The 71bp missing from OR8G1 has been patched with FO680687.2 contained within AP002965.3.

issue.description: RefSeq NM_001005513.1 (OR4C45) is missing from the reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AP006622 replaced by FP710250.10 to resolve 63kb deletion in AP006622.

issue.description: OR8U9 (NM_001013357.1) found in Celera assembly but not in the genomic reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clone ABC9-45432900N15 (AC208786) corrects a 7.1 kb deletion in AP002512.4 that encompasses NM_001013357.1 (OR8U9) and NM_001013356.1 (OR8U8).

issue.summary: Can unlocalized scaffold NT_113921 be localized for GRCh38?
issue.description: Chr. 11 unlocalized scaffold NT_113921.2 (GL000202.1), comprised of component AC160860.2 needs to be localized.
issue.resolution_text: AC160860.2 is contained within AP007216.1. Looking in Ensembl there are no regions of interest on AC160860.2 that are not also present on AP007216.1. Therefore this component will not be included in the tile path; the ticket can be resolved.

issue.status_text: All clones have been sequenced, further investigation is required to locate new sequence that could help resolve this region
issue.description: Assembly gap between AP003388.2 (RP11-768C19) and AP005436.1 (RP11-164N3). For GRCh38 AUXG01000108.1 and ABBA01017306.1 was added extending from AP003388.2 and AUXG01000107 and ABBA01011544.1 extending from AP005436.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Assembly gap between AC139749.4 (RP13-870H17) and AP006588.1 (CMF9-203B8)
issue.resolution_text: The gap has been closed

issue.description: Assembly gap between AC126398.5 (CTD-2005G12) and AC126345.11 (RP11-100E23)
issue.resolution_text: The flanking accessions of this ticket have changed. This ticket will be closed and a new one opened to deal with the remaining issues at this location.

issue.status_text: CH17-378C16 further resources will be utilised in locating sequence that covers this region
issue.description: Assembly gap between AP003783.4 (RP11-598K3) and AC234421.2 (ABC9-43854600O13)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Further analysis of available data will be investigated to aid improvement of the region
issue.description: The GRCh37 component AC126398.5 is missing euchromatic sequence on the p-arm side of the centromere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until heterochromatic or centromeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: This region will be investigated further to locate sequence that covers the gap
issue.description: The GRCh37 component AC126345.11 is missing euchromatic sequence on the q-arm side of the centromere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until centromeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: OR8U8 (NM_001013356.1) present in Celera assembly but not in the reference genome
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clone ABC9-45432900N15 (AC208786) corrects a 7.1 kb deletion in AP002512.4 that encompasses NM_001013357.1 (OR8U9) and NM_001013356.1 (OR8U8).

issue.description: NM_001013358.1 is present in the Celera assembly but missing from the reference genome
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC213223.1 covers a 10 kb deletion in AP004245 that encompasses NM_001013358.1 (OR9G9).

issue.status_text: further investigation is required to locate sequence which will help close the gap in this region
issue.description: Assembly gap between AP005897.1 (70K11) and AP005233.3 (RP11-211G23)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: The GRCh37 component AC244668.2 is missing euchromatic sequence leading into the telomere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until telomeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: The flanking regions of this gap have changed. This ticket has been resolved. A new ticket has been opened to deal with the gap in this region.

issue.status_text: The missing exon is present in an alternate tile path within clone AC211344.3 but its representation needs to be updated in relation to the rest of MOB2 on the reference chromosome
issue.description: First exon of NM_053005.2 missing from reference genome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: There are no suitable clones which can be be picked to extend this sequence at present.
issue.description: Assembly gap between FP476015.2 (ABC13-48572800P8) and FP565785.2 (ABC8-40972400D1). For GRCh38 ABBA01040004.1 was added extending into the gap from FP476015.2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Investigation of ATM gene (Gene ID: 472) has indicated a possible error in the reference sequence.
issue.description: Investigation of ATM gene (Gene ID: 472) has indicated a possible error in the reference sequence.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF455499.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 472 (ATM) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Clinical lab reporting a rare base in a tested gene: BDNF
issue.description: The base at chr11:27,679,662 (T) is a very rare base that is not typically seen in most populations, and seen rarely in YRI.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459669.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of Gene ID: 627 (BDNF) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Very rare deletion allele of rs11410745 affects translation of SRSF8
issue.description: The current genome represents the deletion allele of rs11410745 in SRSF8, truncating the translation to 150 (of 282) aa.
issue.resolution_text: Issue created in error.

issue.description: NM_001012709.1 (nt 1-435) aligns to the reference genome poorly (AP006285.2) but aligns with 100% identity to the Celera assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC130310.17 was sequenced and aligned to this region. The component contains the missing data from this area and should resolve this issue, fully representing the KRTAP5-4 gene.

issue.summary: Indel rs11314683 affecting an NMD transcript of the ILK gene, is reported by 1000genomes as never occurring, confirmed by additional analyses.
issue.description: Indel rs11314683 is reported by 1000genomes phase1 under strict accessibility criteria as never occurring and is also confirmed by Jared Simpson's 61mer analysis. It results in a frameshift in an NMD transcript of the ILK gene.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF510380.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of Gene ID: 3611 (ILK) in GRCh38.

issue.status_text: There are no clones suitable to pick for this issue.
issue.description: The GRCh37 component AC069287.7 is missing euchromatic sequence leading into the telomere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until telomeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Reopening b/c it looks like curated switch points don't actually result in the functional gene copy being included in GRCh38. FP710250.11 is contributing the sequence for OR4C45, and this is the clone that contains the premature stop.
issue.description: FP710250.11 contains a G at nt 76667 that causes a premature stop codon and termination of the CDS of NM_001005513.1. The base is a T on the RefSeq transcript and on AC110057.3
issue.resolution_text: Component AC110057 was added to the reference tile path. This addition now results in a functional copy of OR4C45 on the reference.

issue.summary: Non-component AC004556.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component AC004556.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals alignments to various places on chromosome 11 but I am unable to localise it.
issue.resolution_text: Non-component AC004556.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals alignments to various places on chromosome 11 but I am unable to localise it. The component has been added to the chromosome 11 unlocalised TPF.

issue.summary: Non-component AC240134.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly.
issue.description: Non-component AC240134.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals alignments to AP003062.3 and AP003050.4 which are on chromosome 11. AC240134.3 contains sequence not present on the reference assembly and so will be added to an alternative haplotype tile path.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226006.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226006.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: BLASTing AC226006.2 shows that it is contained within AP006477.2. This will be added to the Alternate tile path, since AP006477.2 is already associated with another decoy component (also in ALT_3 but there is no overlap between the two decoy sequences).

issue.summary: AP006285.2: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AP006285.2 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: Clone name corrected.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC130364.5
issue.status_text: There is an inversion in AC130364.5 confirmed by optical map and end sequence alignments. ABBA01060664.1 will be used to correct this inversion
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC130364.5
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC044810.7
issue.description: Analysis of GU269125.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~10,150 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC044810.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: A scaffold has been created containing AC243812.1, which represents a sequence variant containing ~10kb that does not align to GRCh38 NC_000011.10 component AC044810.7

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC129895.5
issue.status_text: RP11 WGS indicates this is variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267036.1 and GU267644.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~1,724 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC129895.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC084117.6
issue.status_text: RP11 Whole genome shotgun and optical map data indicates this difference is down to variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU268570.1 and GU268751.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~2,694 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC084117.6. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC100767.2
issue.status_text: RP11 Whole genome shotgun data indicates this is variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267633.1, GU267907.1 and GU268469.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~3,082 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC100767.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL135932.7
issue.status_text: RP11 whole genome shotgun and Optical map data indicates this is variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU268133.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~1,307 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL135932.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC104942.5
issue.status_text: RP11 Whole genome shotgun data and optical map data indicate this is variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU268636.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~4,536 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC104942.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP000487.6
issue.status_text: RP11 whole genome shotgun and optical map data show this is variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU268360.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~3,652 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP000722.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU267904.1, GU268375.1, GU268414.1 and GU267067.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~4,078 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AP000722.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: The addition of a patch with AC203617.3 as a contained clone corrects a ~4kb deletion within AP000722.5, and also replaces a sequence error "C" allele with a "T" based on RP11 Whole genome shotgun alignments within GRCh38 component AP000722.5 Chromosome 11 at NC_000011.10: 92329706 (rs10765545) which has a MAF=0 in 1000 Genomes phase 3.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP003383.2
issue.status_text: Optical map evidence and other available clone sequence indicate this is variation not a clone error
issue.description: Analysis of GU267889.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 11, suggest there may be ~826 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AP003383.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001467.4 (SLC37A4) and the genomic region to which it aligns
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP003392_1 (FP885832.1) confirms the sequence of NM_001467 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: AC004556.1 matches well to AC051649.21, but was added to represent 1kG ph1 decoy that was absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly at 99054-100316bp
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Comparison to various assemblies and BioNano maps suggests potential missing sequence in GRCh38 NC_000011.10 component AC027369.8 (RP11-56P9).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_001004756.1 aligns to celera (AADB02013590.1:134531..135511) 100% but only 99% to current assembly component AC104389
issue.resolution_text: The RefSeq quoted in this ticket, NM_001004756, was updated from NM_001004756.1 to NM_001004756.2 since this issue was first reported. NM_001004756.2 now spligns perfectly to GRCh37.

issue.description: NM_001005175.1 aligns to genomic sequences AB065813, AC026090, and BK004385 100%, but to assembly component AC131574 99% with 4 mismatches
issue.resolution_text: No updates were made to the reference assembly. Upon investigation of the mismatches between NM_001005175.2 and AC131574.4 they were discovered to have a minor allele frequency of greater than 5%.

issue.description: NM_001005173.1 aligns to AC111177.15 with 4 mismatches (99.6%) but aligns to Celera (AADB02013597.1) and alternate BACs (AB065819.1 or AC009642) 100%
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF570259.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 338751 (OR52L1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Assembly component AC074191.3 contains a 1 nt deletion with respect to NM_006108.2 (SPON1). The sequence in the assembly component makes the transcript a candidate for nonsense-mediated mRNA decay (NMD), and should be checked to see if there is an error at this position.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AC074191_1 has been submitted as a contained clone and this corrects the sequence.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AADD01112371.1 and AADC01095577.1.
issue.resolution_text: The gap flanking regions of this ticket have changed. This ticket will be closed and a new one opened to deal with this region.

issue.status_text: further analysis will be carried out
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC051649.21 and AC123789.6
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference
issue.description: Comparison to Chimp and Venter suggest missing sequence in reference.
issue.resolution_text: AP006622 replaced by FP710250.11 to resolve 63kb deletion in AP006622. Component FP710250.10 corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000011.9, in component AP006622.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_000694.2 (ALDH3B1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF573694.1, KF459677.1 and KF459677.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update several bases to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 221 (ALDH3B1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_000804.2 (FOLR3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459676.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the alternative allele to improve representation of GeneID: 2352 (FOLR3) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001467.4 (SLC37A4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP003392_1 (FP885832.1) confirms the sequence of NM_001467 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product. This component has subsequently been replaced by FO680690.4.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_002426.3 (MMP12) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP000789_1 confirms the sequence of NM_002426 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_000615.5 (NCAM1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP000802_1 confirms the sequence of NM_000615 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004879.3 (EI24) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459674.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 9538 (EI24) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_032102.2 (SFRS2B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP001264_1 confirms the sequence of NM_032102 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_016403.3 (CWC15) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP002383_1 confirms the sequence of NM_016403 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_021729.4 (VPS11) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Analysis of 1000 Genomes reads and SRR834589 (RP11 reads) show no support for the indel observed in the reference assembly sequence provided by component AP003392.1 (RP11-110I1) at NC_000011.9: 118939941. Minicontig KF511489.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the indel that was observed here in order to improve representation of GeneID: 55823 (VPS11) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_024740.2 (ALG9) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP001781_1 confirms the sequence of NM_024740 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_030930.2 (UNC93B1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459673.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 81622 (UNC93B1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001037954.2 (DIXDC1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP000907_1 confirms the sequence of NM_001037954 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_052854.2 (CREB3L1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459675.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 90993 (CREB3L1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_138706.3 (B3GNT6) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AP000752_1 confirms the sequence of NM_138706 and has been included in the TPF as a contained product.

issue.summary: Blunt/short certification required for AC103854.2 and AC087447.5
issue.description: Possible blunt/short join between AC103854.2 and AC087447.5 requires certification evidence.
issue.resolution_text: Certificate submitted for short join.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AADD01112371.1 and AADC01095577.1
issue.resolution_text: duplicate of HG-263

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AADD01115518.1 and AC126345.11
issue.resolution_text: The gap flanking regions of this ticket have changed. This ticket will be closed and a new one opened to deal with this region.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AP006281.2 and AP006724.1
issue.resolution_text: Components AC110283.4 and AP006724.1 overlap. The gap that previously existed in this ticket has therefore been closed.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AADD01116787.1 and AADD01116788.1
issue.resolution_text: The gap flanking regions of this ticket have changed. This ticket will be closed and a new one opened to deal with this region.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AC154114.1 and AC154091.1
issue.resolution_text: The gap in NC_000011.9 between components AC154114.1 and AC154091.1 has been closed by the clone RP11-643C9 (AP007216).

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AADD01118406.1 and AADD01118410.1
issue.resolution_text: The accession for this ticket has changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1521.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between component AP005135.2 and the telomere
issue.resolution_text: Ticket created in error. No problem in this region. Clone ABC13-48839600C23 (LH) cancelled since it is unnecessary; clone 454O9 contains telomeric sequence.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AADD01117999.1 and AP005436.1
issue.resolution_text: The gap flanking regions of this ticket have changed. This ticket will be closed and a new one opened to deal with this region.

issue.description: The GRCh37 component AC069287.7 is missing euchromatic sequence leading into the telomere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until telomeric repeats are identified.
issue.resolution_text: The accession for this ticket has changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1519.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113919 might be able to replace WGS in reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113919 might be able to replace WGS in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: unplaced contig is now included in the TPF

issue.summary: compensating deletion-insertion in AADC01095577.1 affecting gene MUC5AC.
issue.description: Human chromosome 11 clone AADC01095577.1 has a 1bp deletion followed shortly afterwards by a 1bp insertion in a coding exon of the MUC5AC gene compared to transcripts that match there.
issue.resolution_text: The removal of the whole genome shotgun sequence nullifies the reported problem. However, a gap still remains within the MUC5AC gene. This will be addressed in HG-263.

issue.description: NM_012309.2,nts 991-1182 don't align to the reference genome NC_000011.8.
issue.resolution_text: ABC9-43854600O13 (AC234421.2) provides the sequence for the SHANK2 exons that was missing in this region.

issue.summary: Real snp in AC090835.7 affecting CALCA gene or sequencing error?
issue.description: D>N snp rs5239 in CALCA gene on AC090835.7 needs validating.
issue.resolution_text: PCR_RP11_AC090835_1 confirms the discrepant base should be a G, which agrees with the cDNAs and ESTs. This PCR product has now been submitted as a contained clone and the TPF uploaded.

issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000011.9 nt 62,910,849 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_001136506.1(GeneID: 283238 (SLC22A24))
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459672.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 283238 (SLC22A24) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a substitution in the intronic part of the CASP12 splice donor. There are one validated and three non-validated SNPs in the region.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF495792.1, KF459667.1 and KF495790.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update several bases to the more common allele to improve representation of Gene ID: 100506742 (CASP12) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: ACTN3 gene might represent uncommon allele
issue.description: GRCh37 contains a non-coding allele for ACTN3. This is a known polymorphism in the human population (rs1815739 ).
issue.resolution_text: Component AMYH02024979.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 11 Reference to update the non-coding allele that was observed here in order to improve representation of GeneID: 89 (ACTN3) in GRCh38.

issue.status_text: Awaiting SAB decision on how to represent variation in the reference.
issue.description: NM_016499.3 mis-spligns to GRCh37. The last intron should be shifted one nucleotide from 684 to 685 with GT-CG splice sites. The Celera and HuRef assemblies have an extra 'A' at NC_000011.9 resulting in a consensus AG acceptor. Several draft BACs all have the same missing base, but it is unlikely that splicing can occur at the -CG site.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_173584.3 aligns to GRCh37 with GA-AG splice sites. In HuRef and Celera the GA donor is GT.
issue.resolution_text: SNP rs61876746 is validated and the 'A' at this position represents the major allele so this will be kept.

issue.summary: OVCH2 has an Alu insertion in the reference assembly; 1000genomes data suggests this is a minor allele
issue.description: OVCH2 contains an exonic Alu insertion in the reference genome, representing a pseudogenisation event. Our 1000genomes analysis indicates that this insertion is likely to represent a rare allele, and it is thus a candidate for removal from the reference sequence.
issue.resolution_text: WGS component ABBA01028682.1 has been added to the tile path. This removes the Alu that is splitting an exon in OVCH2.

issue.summary: assembly/clone problem (missing sequence) in clone AP005401.3 and/or AP003783.4
issue.description: Two variant cDNAs for the SHANK2 gene suggest an assembly or clone problem (missing sequence) in clone AP005401.3 or AP003783.4.
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-865. Please see Jira issue HG-865 for all future updates regarding this issue.
